Reviews.Title: “Not bad but not impressed”
Reviews.Author: Kiret
Reviews.Content: recently booked 4night stay hotel spend weekend partner rome actually 3 nights night round corner 2 hotel plumbing albeit handled minimal fuss werent bothered coming stay hotel initial impression clean natural light window adequate sleep inbetween exploring fabulous city outside issues hotel morning breakfast included booked online little bread packet french toast butter sachets jam suggestion cereal earlier sat noisy breakfast ignored staff decided bother left seek eat onthego according hotel pay breakfast included cost 7 euros person definitely worth money opinion instead panini shop road couple shower lacking door resulting lot water bathroom floor tv english language channels whatsoever 2 hotel bbc world news quality sleep hotel regrettably poor pillows flat provided little support duvet sheet thin blanket noisy heater night prevent waking cold street noise window shut loud disturbed sleep mornings double glazing appreciated recommend hotel happier star

Reviews.Title: “Avoid - Horrible Experience”

Reviews.Content: trip started badly begin orbitz wouldnt fix booking error original hotel staff ok except indian guy front desk tremendously rude feel inconvenience hotel dump bad location major sites historical center ring front desk building elevator shaky computer hallway didnt mention horrible smell restroom entire trip 5 nights nauseated smell sewer gas forced run water night able stay hotel staff accomodate blamed building ac didnt trip tv wouldnt rude indian guy finally troubleshoot hangers hang clothes cleaning staff bring fresh towels hotel worth stay main sites worth hassel love rome 3rd time visiting id hope debating chosing hotel negative comments seriously final decision dissapointed stay
